metadata.name: Service DACL Abuse To Hide Services Via Sc.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the "sc.exe" utility adding a new service with special permission seen used by threat actors which makes the service hidden and unremovable.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sc.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sdset')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dclcwpdtsd')))

output.summary: Detects usage of the "sc.exe" utility adding a new service with special permission seen used by threat actors which makes the service hidden and unremovable.
